title: Putting Gears In Motion: Animating Cars With HTML And SVG
excerpt: SVG `` provides a way to define how an element moves along a motion path. In this article, Paul Scanlon shares an idea of how to use it by animating race cars in an infinite loop as easy as one-two-three!
